thread.section_title: The Marine Hermanus - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel - Review of The Marine Hermanus, Hermanus, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: marieannepain
title: Beautiful hotel
text:
Great hotel and very nice staff.
The spa staff is very gentle and caring.
The localization is perfect near by the center and facing the ocean.
The walking trail pass in front of the hotel: very convenient.
The room are spacious and beautifully decored.
The breakfast buffet is splendid and the restaurant staff are also very nice.
I highly recommend it
It was heaven!
